Contents: @allghamdi_x In this case you can navigate to safe mode and do the option "Restore PS3 System" All data and settings will be lost by performing this step. This will reformat the hard drive on the PlayStation 3, deleting all data and restoring it to as if it just came out of the box.

Name: Ask PlayStation
Post Title: @allghamdi_x In this case you can navigate to safe mode and do the option "Restore PS3 System" All data and settings will be lost by performing this step. This will reformat the hard drive on the PlayStation 3, deleting all data and restoring it to as if it just came out of the box.

Contents: @Z3styLime Hello! There are two possible reasons for a Paypal not linking to an account: One is that the Paypal account region must match the region of the PSN account (UK and UK) or they won't link. Contents: @ArpcapPowell As the console is in Safe Mode, the cable will not have any influence on recognizing the USB key. In this case, we advise to try again using another USB key and another USB port on the console. If it doesn't work, unfortunately you will have to initialize. ^GA
Author: @AskPS_UK
Name: Ask PlayStation UK
Post Title: @ArpcapPowell As the console is in Safe Mode, the cable will not have any influence on recognizing the USB key. In this case, we advise to try again using another USB key and another USB port on the console. If it doesn't work, unfortunately you will have to initialize. ^GA

Contents: @djfoster08 PSNow is not the same as PS4. PS4 is a platform, PC is a platform, PSNow is a service that is ran on platforms. PSNow is available on two platforms. PC and PS4.
Author: @Puertorock77_
